content_summary: The speaker discusses the concept of cellular collective intelligence in organ formation, using the example of eye development. They also delve into the phenomenon of injury mirroring and bioelectric signal propagation in limb regeneration, emphasizing that this is not neurally mediated but rather a result of bioelectric networks.
